title: From Reels To Chatbots: How AI Is Reshaping Political Campaigns In Pune Civic Polls
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has made its mark on the municipal election campaign. Due to the limited time available for campaigning, candidates are using AI to intensify their social media presence. Experts have observed that various tools, such as audio-visual campaign material creation, sentiment analysis, and AI chatbots, are being extensively used with the help of AI.

title: AI software that can create digital clones of employees unveiled at CES 2026
description: Too many meetings, too little time? A new AI software, unveiled at CES in Las Vegas, builds “digital twins” using an employee’s voice, video and knowledge, allowing them to be in two places at once.

title: Elon Musk says China will 'far exceed the rest of the world in AI compute'
description: Elon Musk says China is going to "have more power than anyone else and probably will have more chips."Evelyn Hockstein/ReutersElon Musk says China is poised to lead the world in AI compute.China's electricity advantage could give it an edge in scaling AI systems.China will also "figure out the...

title: Chinese AI server maker xFusion hires bank ahead of IPO
description: XFusion’s shareholders include China Telecom Group Investment and China Mobile Capital Holding, local media said.

title: Arrowhead Raises $3 Mn To Scale Voice AI For BFSI Sales
description: SUMMARY Arrowhead has raised $3 Mn (INR 27 Cr) funding in its seed round led by early-stage focussed VC firm Stellaris Venture Partners The round also saw participation from CRED’s founder Kunal Shah, M2P Fintech’s cofounder Madhusudanan R, among other senior executives from fintech firms like Turtlemint and Kissht Founded by Devyani Gupta and Vengadanathan [...]
